post:
Hi LET,

Happy to post our first offer here on LET.

NECS is a UK VAT Registered company 5504556, incorporated in mid 2005 we have 8 office based staff and have moved in to the VPS market this year after much planning and consultation, we offer both ticket and phone based support as well as windows and linux options.

We have reduced the price on our starter package for the LEB market.

Package Details:

**Starter 1 (KVM)**

4 x vCPU cores
256 MB RAM
15 GB HDD (Raid 10)
1500 GB Transfer 
1 x IP4
5 x IP6

15GB Free offsite backup space (On request)

£4.35 p/month (USD$6.69)

**ORDER Link**: https://www.necs.co.uk/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1
**Discount Code**: LET2560612

Servers based in Redstation.

VAT @ 20% applies to EU Customers only.

Thank you for reading.
NECS.
